title: rust: add debug message in time panic
body:
We met a strange panic here https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/libstd/sys/unix/time.rs#L276,
maybe we can add the earlier and current time debug message in the panic message to let the panic show more clear. 
We may send a PR to rust team. 

Hi @mrmiywj , can you help us do it?
